transcription: No amount of words can justify or explain a tragedy. No amount of words can clarify why such things occur in this reality. But it can be assured the meaning of my words is the purpose of my life.  product of genuine morality. Lost lives got us peering to the sky. Both hands meet as we ask God why. Prayers from the D all the way to N. Why gang bangers on the streets can't even recognize. Take a sec, catch your breath, don't leave just yet. People in a hurry just to see what's coming next. Let's take a bow and make a vow that before we dream the future, we consider right now.  Flags at half-mass.
